column4: Does anybody know why Microsoft fonts are showing up as little boxes in XFCE's font config?

most likely the fonts in question aren't installed/updated properly, you could try apt-get install ttf-mscorefonts-installer (I think that's what it's called, but that's from memory so I might be wrong)
Word.. I'll check out the installer from the repo, I usually just copy them to /usr/share/fonts/truetype and then fc-cache -fv but maybe something weird happened this time.
